name: tree sim test
description: (make sure to click on the game's screen before playing to activate!) arrow keys to move and jump shift to make a block and space to make another and  "G" to make glass double click to delete all blocks and to move the blocks simply drag and drop (you can save now by pressing "s" and when the save is successful it will move side to side, please have in mind that you can only make one save file on your pc)
